name: Andromeda
description: A princess chained to a rock, saved by Perseus.

name: Nebulosus Equinoxalis
description: A scorpion with a prominent stinger.

name: Centaurus
description: A half-human, half-horse creature wielding a spear.

name: Cassiopeia
description: Queen punished for her vanity by being forced to sit on a throne.

name: Cassiopeia
description: Description punished for her vanity by being forced to sit onX a throne.

name: As
description: A maiden holding wheat or a sheaf of wheat.

description: King and husband of Cassiopeia.

name: Aquila
description: The eagle carrying Zeus's thunderbolts.

name: Draco
description: A dragon guarding the North Pole.

name: Hydra
description: A multi-headed serpent-like creature.

name: Lyra
description: The lyre of the mythical musician Orpheus.

name: Orion
description: A mighty hunter wielding a club and a bow.

name: Pegasus
description: A winged horse.

name: Perseus
description: A hero who slayed Medusa and saved Andromeda.

name: Sagitta
description: The arrow used by Hercules.

name: Sagittarius
description: An archer aiming his bow at the heart of Scorpius.

name: Scorpius
description: A scorpion with a prominent stinger.

name: Taurus
description: The bull from Greek mythology.

name: Ursa Major
description: The Great Bear, containing the Big Dipper asterism.

name: Ursa Minor
description: The Little Bear, containing the North Star.

name: Virgo
description: A maiden holding wheat or a sheaf of wheat.

name: Vulpecula
description: A fox carrying a goose in its jaws.
